Rulings.Base:
1. Removing from play 1 other monster you control is a cost. Returning this card to the field does not start a Chain.
2. When you use this card's effect, a replay will occur. The opponent must choose a new target for the attack, he cannot choose not to attack.
3. If "Uni-Horned Familiar" is face-down when its effect resolves, it will still be removed from play.
4. "Uni-Horned Familiar" is returned to the field during the Standby Phase in the same position as it was when it was removed from play.
